AccountBillingAccount.name: AccountBillingAccount
AccountBillingAccount.description: Represents a junction between Account objects and Billing Account          objects.

AccountId.description: The Account associated with the Billing Account.

BillingAccountId.description: The Billing Account associated with the Account.

EndDate.description: The date when the relationship between the Account and Billing                       Account ends.

RelationshipType.description: Specifies the role of the Account associated with the Billing                       Account.

StartDate.description: The date when the relationship between Account and Billing Account                       starts.

Address.name: Address
Address.description: Represents a mailing, billing, or home address.

Floor.description: The floor number in the address

HouseNumberSupplement.description: The house number in a street or apartment block in the                       address

StreetSupplement1.description: The first line of the street address

StreetSupplement2.description: The second line of the street address

UnitNumber.description: The second line of the street address

ApplicationFormTemplate.name: ApplicationFormTemplate
ApplicationFormTemplate.description: Represents the fields to capture application metadata as a template which is          used in application tracking and processing.

ApprovalFlowName.description: The name of the flow that must be launched to approve the                       applications associated with the application form template.

ApplicationType.description: Specifies the type of application or template.

ApprovalLimitAmount.description: Amount up to which the approver has the authority to approve                       applications.

ApproverId.description: The user who must approve the application payout.

Description.description: The description of the application form template.

Name.description: The name of the application form template.

BalanceAdjustmentRequest.name: BalanceAdjustmentRequest
BalanceAdjustmentRequest.description: The request to create a financial adjustment in a backend billing system.          Adjustments requests can be for either debit or credit amounts. Often used to give the          customer a goodwill gesture.

Amount.description: The monetary amount of balance adjustment being requested

ApprovedById.description: The user associated with approving the balance adjustment                       request

ApprovedOn.description: The date the balance adjustment request was approved

BillingAccountId.description: The billing profile associated with the balance adjustment                       request

BlockReason.description: Specifies the reason why the balance adjustment request is placed                       on hold from further processing

IsBlocked.description: Indicates whether the balance adjustment request is placed on hold                       from further processing

Reason.description: The reason that the balance adjustment is requested

Status.description: Specifies the current status of the balance adjustment                       request

Type.description: Specifies the type of balance adjustment requested

BenefitAssignment.name: BenefitAssignment
BenefitAssignment.description: Represents the enrollment information of an individual or business that is          captured in an application. For example, an individual who is unemployed can raise an          application requesting help from the government. If it is approved, the individual is          enrolled into the unemployment insurance benefit.

ApprovalRejectionReason.description: The reason for rejecting the benefit amount requested by the                       enrollee.

ApprovalStatus.description: Indicates whether the benefit assignment has been approved or                       not.

BenefitId.description: Required. Name of the benefit that is associated with the                       assignment.

EarningThresholdAmount.description: The maximum amount the enrollee can earn for a given period to be                       eligible for a benefit.

EndDateTime.description: The end date up to when the assignment is valid.

EnrolleeId.description: Name of the individual being enrolled for the benefit.

EnrollmentCount.description: The number of times the benefit is applicable to an                       individual.

EntitlementAmount.description: The benefit amount that an enrollee is eligible for.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

MaximumBenefitAmount.description: The maximum amount that can be disbursed during an enrollment                       period.

MinimumBenefitAmount.description: The minimum amount that can be disbursed during an enrollment                       period.

Name.description: Name of the benefit assignment.

NextPayoutDate.description: The due date for the next scheduled benefit payment.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

ParentRecordId.description: Required. The parent record associated with the benefit                       assignment.

PayoutFrequency.description: Specifies the frequency of the benefit payment.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the benefit assignment.

ProgramEnrollmentId.description: The identifier of the program enrollment record that's associated                       with the benefit assignment.

Quantity.description: The benefit quantity allocated to the enrollee.

RecertificationDueDate.description: The date by when the enrolee must recertify eligibility to                       continue receiving the benefit.

RecertificationStatus.description: Specifies the recertification status of the enrollee's eligibility                       for the benefit assignment.

ReferenceNumber.description: The reference number used to indicate the enrollee's benefit                       request.

RemainingAmount.description: The remainder benefit amount that is to be paid to the                       enrollee.

StartDateTime.description: The start date from when the assignment begins.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the benefit assignment.

TaskJobStatus.description: Specifies the status of the task in the task queue.

TaskJobStatusMessage.description: The message that describes the status of the task in the                       queue.

TotalApprovedAmount.description: The total benefit amount approved for an enrollee.

TotalPaidAmount.description: The total benefit amount that has already been paid to the                       enrollee.

UnitOfMeasureId.description: Specifies the unit of measurement of the benefit allocated to the                       enrollee.

BenefitSchedule.name: BenefitSchedule
BenefitSchedule.description: Represents information about the plan for delivering the          benefit.

BenefitId.description: The identifier of the benefit that's associated with the                       schedule.

DefaultBenefitQuantity.description: The default quantity of benefit that's provided within a session                       of benefit schedule.

Description.description: The description of the benefit schedule.

FirstSessionEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the first session ends in the benefit                       schedule.

FirstSessionStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the first session begins in the benefit                       schedule.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

MaximumParticipantCount.description: The maximum number of participants in a session.

Name.description: The name of the benefit schedule.

BenefitSession.name: BenefitSession
BenefitSession.description: Represents information about an instance of a planned benefit          delivery

AbsenteesCount.description: The total number of participants who didn't attend the benefit                       session.

AttendanceRate.description: The percentage of participants who attended the benefit session.                          The value of this field is calculated by a formula:                          (Attendees Count) / (Attendees Count + Absentees Count)

AttendeesCount.description: The total number of participants who attended a benefit                       session.

BenefitScheduleId.description: The identifier of the benefit schedule that's associated with the                       benefit session.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the benefit session.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the benefit session.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the benefit session record owner.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the benefit session.

Status.description: The status of the benefit session.

BillingAccount.name: BillingAccount
BillingAccount.description: Represents the customer's billing controls in the backend system. Used to set          up and maintain details such as bill frequency, bill format, and autopay details.

BillCopiesRequested.description: The number of bill copies per month requested by the                       customer.

BillingEmailAddress.description: Email address to use for email delivery of bills.

ContactPreferenceType.description: Specifies the preferred method of communications to the contacts                       in this account such as mail, email or phone.

CreditRating.description: The credit rating of the customer

CreditScore.description: The credit score of the customer

CustomerClass.description: Speficies the grouping of accounts by attributes such as                       residential, small or medium businesses etc. Used to drive                       accounting processes, business logic, and validation rules.

ExtlBillCycle.description: Specifies the grouping that controls when a bill is produced.

ExtlBillDeliveryMethod.description: Specifies the chosen method to receive bills.

ExtlBillFormat.description: Specifies the format of the bill that the customer receives, such                       as a detailed or a summary bill.

ExtlBillFrequency.description: Specifies the the frequency at which bills are generated such as                       Monthly, Quarterly or Weekly.

ExtlReferenceIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the billing system.

ExtlTaxExmpEndDate.description: The date until which the tax exemption is valid.

ExtlTaxExmpPercentage.description: Tax exemption percentage the account is eligible for.

ExtlTaxExmpStartDate.description: The date from which the tax exemption is valid.

ExtlTaxExmpType.description: Specifies the type of tax exemption the account is eligible                       for.

ExtlTaxIdentifier.description: The external tax identifier number for this customer.

IsAutopayEnabled.description: Indicates whether the customer has opted for automatic payment.

IsBillingHold.description: Indicates whether billing is suspended on this customer's                       account

PrimaryBillAddr.description: Address to which bills are to be sent

Status.description: Specifies the status of the customer billing account.

TmpBillingAddr.description: The alternative address if the bill should not be sent to the                       customer's primary address

TmpBillingAddrEndDate.description: The end date when the alternate billing address should be                       used

TmpBillingAddrStartDate.description: The start date when the alternate billing address should be                       used

BillingAccountContact.name: BillingAccountContact
BillingAccountContact.description: Represents a junction between Billing Account objects and Contact          objects.

BillingAccountId.description: The Billing Account associated with the Contact.

ContactId.description: The Contact associated with the Billing Account.

RelationshipEndDate.description: The date when the relationship between the Contact and Billing                       Account ends.

RelationshipStartDate.description: The date when the relationship between Contact and Billing Account                       starts.

RelationshipType.description: Specifies the role of the Contact associated with the Billing                       Account.

Budget.name: Budget
Budget.description: Tracks an estimate of future revenue or expenses during a specific          time period.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the budget.

Amount.description: The total amount of funds for a budget shown in currency                       format.

EstimatedUtilizationAmount.description: The amount that's estimated to be utilized from the budget.

Description.description: The description of the budget and its related business                       processes.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the budget has been submitted. This field is                       available from API version 58.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: Name of the budget.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.

ParentBudgetId.description: ID of the associated parent budget.

PeriodEndDate.description: The end of the date range for which the budget applies.

PeriodName.description: The name of the time period to which the budget applies.

PeriodStartDate.description: The beginning of the date range for which the budget applies.

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the budget.

Quantity.description: The quantity used to track a budget for non-currency projects. For                       example, this could be number of hours or number of resources.

Type.description: Categorizes the budget by how it will be used.

UtilizedAmount.description: The amount that has already been utilized from the budget.

BudgetCategory.name: BudgetCategory
BudgetCategory.description: Represents the purpose of the budget line item.

BudgetId.description: The parent budget that's associated with the budget category.

Description.description: The description of the budget category.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the budget category.

Reason.description: The reason why an item is being included in the budget.

SequenceNumber.description: The number assigned to a budget category that's used to edit or show a category.

BudgetCategoryValue.name: BudgetCategoryValue
BudgetCategoryValue.description: Captures budget values for category and time period.

ActualAmount.description: The actual amount of the budget that was used.

ActualQuantity.description: The actual quantity of the budget that was used.

Amount.description: The planned amount for the budget.

BudgetCategoryId.description: The ID that's associated with this budget category value.

BudgetDivisionId.description: The budget period that's associated with the budget category                       value.

Comments.description: The comments about how the budget was used.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: The name of this budget category value.

Quantity.description: The planned quantity for the budget. Use when establishing budgets                       for non-currency projects.

VarianceAmount.description: The amount over or under the planned budget that was used.

VarianceQuantity.description: The quantity over or under the planned budget that was used.

BudgetPeriod.name: BudgetPeriod
BudgetPeriod.description: Defines a distinct time interval in which the estimate applies.

BudgetId.description: The parent budget that's associated with the budget period.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the budget has been submitted. This field is available from API version 59.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the budget period.

PeriodEndDate.description: The date when the budget period ends.

PeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the budget period.

SequenceNumber.description: The order in which the budget period is shown.

CaseProgram.name: CaseProgram
CaseProgram.description: Represents the junction between Case and Program objects.

CaseId.description: The identifer of the case that’s associated with the program.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the case program.

ProgramId.description: The identifier of the program that’s associated with the                       case.

CaseRelatedSubject.name: CaseRelatedSubject
CaseRelatedSubject.description: Represents a junction between a case and an object impacted by the case.

CaseId.description: The case number associated with the reference object.

ReferenceObjectId.description: The name of the object that's associated with the case.

CostCenter.name: CostCenter
CostCenter.description: Represents the actual expenses that are compared to the budget.

Description.description: The description of the cost center.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the cost center is no longer in effect.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the cost center takes effect.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier of the cost center.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the cost center is active.

Name.description: The name of the cost center.

EnergyServiceAgreement.name: EnergyServiceAgreement
EnergyServiceAgreement.description: The services or commodities purchased by a customer, for a specified product          and optionally linked to a Contract. Contracted Services can be physical goods (eg.          appliances), commodity services (eg. electricity, gas or water) or other miscellaneous          services (eg. homeowner insurance, boiler maintenance contract).

AccountId.description: The Account object associated with the energy service agreement.                       This account is financially responsible for the energy service                       agreement.

ActivationDate.description: The date on which this service was activated

BillingSchedule.description: Specifies the frequency at which bills are generated such as                       Monthly, Quarterly or Weekly.

ContractId.description: The Contract object associated with the energy service                       agreement.

EndDate.description: The date that the service agreement ends for a customer

ExternalContractIdentifier.description: External identifier of the contract that governs the energy                       service agreement

Product2Id.description: The Product2 object associated with the energy service agreement.

StartDate.description: The date that the service agreement starts for a customer

Status.description: Specifies the status of the service.

StatusChangeDate.description: The date on which the status last changed

StatusReason.description: The details describing the status of the service

EnergyServiceAgreementItem.name: EnergyServiceAgreementItem
EnergyServiceAgreementItem.description: Represents the details of the Energy Service Agreement object such as the          time, location, and pricing information.

AssetId.description: The Asset object associated with the energy service agreement                       item.

BillingAccountId.description: The Billing Profile object associated with the energy service                       agreement item. The billing profile corresponds to the billing                       entity in the legacy billing application, and is responsible for                       billing charges for this service.

EndDate.description: The date that the energy service agreement ends for a                       customer

EnergyServiceAgreementId.description: The Energy Service Agreement object associated with the energy                       service agreement item.

LocationId.description: The Location object associated with the energy service                       agreement.

OneTimePrice.description: The one-time price for a service

Product2Id.description: The Product2 object associated with the energy service agreement                       line item.

RecurringPrice.description: The recurring price for a service

RecurringPriceFrequency.description: The frequency of the recurring charge for a service.

ServicePointId.description: The Service Point object associated with the energy service                       agreement.

StartDate.description: The date that the energy service agreement starts for a                       customer

UsagePeriod.description: The duration over which the estimated usage has occured

UsagePrice.description: The estimated usage price of a service

UsageQuantity.description: The estimated usage quantity used to determine the usage price for                       this service

UsageUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure used to determine the estimated usage                       price

ProgramProductId.description: The ProgramProduct object associated with the Indicator                       Assignment.

IndividualApplication.name: IndividualApplication
IndividualApplication.description: Represents an application form submitted by an individual.

AccountId.description: The ID of the applicant’s account.

AmountPaid.description: The amount paid by the applicant.

ApplicationCategory.description: Categorizes the ways an application can be processed.

ApplicationName.description: Descriptive name for the application. This field is available if                       you enabled Public Sector Solutions or Grantmaking in Setup.

ApplicationReferenceNumber.description: The custom reference number assigned to the application. This                       field is available if you enabled Health Cloud, Public Sector                       Solutions, or Grantmaking in Setup.

AppliedDate.description: The date on which the application was received from the                       applicant.

ApprovedDate.description: The date on which the application was approved.

ApplicationFormTemplateId.description: The Application Form Template associated with the application.

ExternalProject.description: The ID assigned to the project by an external data source.

IsApprovalRequired.description: Indicates whether an application requires approval before it is                       accepted.

IsSubmittedByThirdParty.description: Indicates whether the application is submitted by a third                       party.

Status.description: The submission and approval status of the application.

SubmittedByAccountId.description: The account that submitted the application.

SubmittedByContactId.description: The contact that submitted the application.

ParentApplicationId.description: The parent application for a program that has separate                       applications for multiple measures.

RejectionReason.description: Specifies the reason that the customer's application is rejected.

ServiceType.description: Specifies the type of service in the application.

BudgetId.description: The budget associated with the individual application. This field                       is available if you enabled Public Sector Solutions or Grantmaking                       in Setup.

BusinessTypeId.description: The type of individual business activity for this application.

Category.description: The service category of the application.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the individual application.

Description.description: Text description provided by the applicant.

FundingOpportunityId.description: The funding opportunity associated with the individual                       application. This field is available if you enabled Public Sector                       Solutions or Grantmaking in Setup.

FundingRequestPurpose.description: Description of what the individual application funds are used for.                       This field is available if you enabled Public Sector Solutions or                       Grantmaking in Setup.

Given_Name__c.description: The given name of the applicant.

InternalStatus.description: Status of the individual application in Salesforce CRM.

IsOwnerEditable.description: Whether the owner ID of this record can be changed.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the individual application has been submitted.                       This field is available if you enabled Public Sector Solutions or                       Grantmaking in Setup.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed this record. If                       this value is null, this record might only have been referenced                       (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LicensePermitNameId.description: The emergency service authorization that will be granted if this                       application is approved.

LicenseTypeId.description: The type of emergency service that the applicant will                       provide.

Name.description: The auto-generated unique ID for this application.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user that owns this record.

Passport_Number__c.description: The passport ID of the applicant.

PaymentDate.description: The date and time at which payment was received from the                       applicant.

RecordTypeId.description: The record associated to the application.

RequestedAmount.description: Amount requested in the individual application. This field is                       available if you enabled Public Sector Solutions or Grantmaking in                       Setup.

RequirementsCompleteDate.description: The date when the applicant fulfilled all the requirements for                       approval.

SavedApplicationRefId.description: Reference Id of the saved application.

Surname__c.description: The last name of the applicant.

WasReturned.description: Whether a submitted application was sent back to the applicant due                       to errors.

IndividualApplicationItem.name: IndividualApplicationItem
IndividualApplicationItem.description: Captures individual application input data that is used during run-time.

IndividualApplicationId.description: The Individual Application parent object associated with the                       Individual Application Item.

Name.description: The name of the object related to the Individual Application.

RelatedItemId.description: This field is a polymorphic relationship field.

Status.description: Specifies the approval status of the Individual Application.

SelectedValues.description: The values selected in the                       individual application.

JobExpenseType.name: JobExpenseType
JobExpenseType.description: Represents a unique expense type associated with a standard job in an          organization, which is used to measure the job costs and budget.

Description.description: The description of the job expense in the Enterprise Asset                       Management system.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the job expense is no longer in effect.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the job expense takes effect.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier of the job expense.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the job expense type is active.

Name.description: The name of the job expense in the Enterprise Asset Management                       system.

LaborUnion.name: LaborUnion
LaborUnion.description: Represents the labor union organization that field technician is associated          with. This association decides the wage classification, pay type, overtime code,          supplemental compensation and wage calculation rules.

Description.description: The description of the labor union in the external system.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the labor union is active (true) or not                       (false)

Name.description: The name of the labor union in the external system.

Trade.description: The trade associated with the labor union.

ActivationDate.description: The date on which service was started at this location.

BusinessHoursId.description: The Business Hours object associated with the Location

DistributionArea.description: The electricity, gas, or water distribution area this location                       belongs to.

GrossFloorArea.description: The value of the sum of the floor area of the spaces within the                       location

GrossFloorAreaUom.description: Specifies the unit of measure for Gross Floor Area of the                       location

HasLifeSupport.description: Indicates whether the location has life-support equipment.

HasSensitiveLoad.description: Indicates whether the location has sensitive load equipment.

IsKeyAtPremises.description: Indicates whether the key is available at the location

IsOkToEnter.description: Indicates whether the field service representative has permission                       to enter the location

IsSupplyGuaranteed.description: Indicates whether supply is guaranteed at the location

MeterReadInstructions.description: The instructions for the field service representative on where to                       find the meter in this location

MeterReadWarning.description: The warnings for the field service representative of potentially                       dangerous situations or conditions at this location

NumberOfOccupants.description: The number of occupants at this location.

PrimaryPropertyFunction.description: Specifies the primary use of the location

PropertyOwnerAccountId.description: The Account object associated with the Location

Status.description: Specifies the status of the location.

SupplyGuaranteeReason.description: The reason for which supply is guaranteed at the location

IsInventoryLocation.description: Indicates whether the location stores parts. This field must be                       selected if you want to associate the location with product                       items.

IsMobile.description: Indicates whether the location moves. For example, a truck or tool                       box.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the location was last modified. Its label in the                       user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the location was last viewed.

LocationType.description: Picklist of location types. It has no default values, so you must                       populate it before creating any location records.

LogoId.description: A ContentAsset representing a logo for the location.

Name.description: The name of the location. For example, Service Van #4.

RootLocationId.description: (Read Only) The top-level location in the location’s                       hierarchy.

OvertimeApprover.name: OvertimeApprover
OvertimeApprover.description: Represents a person who approves overtime hours.

ApproverRole.description: The role of the overtime approver.

ApproverUserId.description: The user ID associated with the overtime approver if the approver                       is a Salesforce user.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The ID assigned to the overtime approver by an external data                       source.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the overtime approver is active (true) or not                       (false).

OvertimeType.name: OvertimeType
OvertimeType.description: Represents the overtime type code used to categorize overtime labor costs in the Enterprise Resource Planning system.

Description.description: The description of the overtime type in the external system.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The identifier assigned to the overtime type by an external data                       source.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the overtime type is active.

Name.description: The name of the overtime type in the external system.

PayGrade.name: PayGrade
PayGrade.description: Represents a range of positions that require sufficiently similar          responsibilities and competencies, and are associated with a common pay band.

LaborUnionId.description: The labor union associated with the pay grade.

PayType.name: PayType
PayType.description: Represents the type of pay provided to the field service worker that          determines the hourly rate based on a labor agreement.

Description.description: The description of the pay type.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the pay type is no longer in effect.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the pay type takes effect.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier of the pay type.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the pay type is active.

Name.description: The name of the pay type.

WageType.description: Specifies the type of pay provided to the field service                       worker.

PreliminaryApplicationRef.name: PreliminaryApplicationRef
PreliminaryApplicationRef.description: Represents the saved applications and pre-screening forms.

ApplicationStatus.description: Specifies the status of the application.

Description.description: The description of the preliminary application.

DynamicAttribute.description: The details of the equipment included in the project.

ProgramId.description: The Program associated with the preliminary application.

RejectionReason.description: Specifies the reason the customer's application is rejected.

Score.description: The priority score of the application.

BusinessAccountNameId.description: ID of the business account related to the application.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the application was submitted.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this            record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the preliminary application.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.

SavedApplicationUrl.description: Relative path of the saved application.

Program.name: Program
Program.description: Represents information about the enrollment and disbursement of          benefits in a program.

ActiveEnrolleeCount.description: The count of program enrollees in Active status. This field is                       accessible if you enabled Data Protection and Privacy in                       Setup.

AdditionalContext.description: The additional context about the program. This field is accessible                       if you enabled Data Protection and Privacy in Setup.

ApplicationFormTemplateId.description: The Application Form Template associated with the program.

BusinessSector.description: Specifies the business sector for the program.

EffectiveYear.description: The year the program becomes effective.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the program is active.

IsRegulatoryProgram.description: Indicates whether the program is a regulatory program.

ProgramDeliveryType.description: Specifies if the program is delivered upstream, midstream, or                       downstream.

ProgramManagerId.description: The program manager for the program.

RegulatoryProgramName.description: The name of the regulatory program.

Stakeholder.description: Specifies the stakeholders for the program.

CurrentMonthDisbCount.description: The count of benefit that's disbursed in the current month. This                       field is accessible if you enabled Data Protection and Privacy in                       Setup.

CurrentYearDisbCount.description: The count of benefit that's disbursed in the current year. This                       field is accessible if you enabled Data Protection and Privacy in                       Setup.

EndDate.description: The date when the program ends. This field is accessible if you                       enabled Data Protection and Privacy in Setup.

EnrollmentCompletedCount.description: The count of program enrollees in Completed status. This field is accessible if you                       enabled Data Protection and Privacy in Setup.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the program.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the object.

PreviousMonthDisbCount.description: The count of benefit that's disbursed in the previous month. This                       field is accessible if you enabled Data Protection and Privacy in                       Setup.

PreviousYearDisbCount.description: The count of benefit that's disbursed in the previous year. This                       field is accessible if you enabled Data Protection and Privacy in                       Setup.

StartDate.description: The date when the program begins.

Summary.description: The summary of the program. This field is accessible if you                       enabled Data Protection and Privacy in Setup.

TotalEnrolleeCount.description: The total enrollee count in the program. This field is accessible                       if you enabled Data Protection and Privacy in Setup.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the program.

DefaultImageComment.description: The comments about the default image that's associated with the                       program.

DefaultImageUrl.description: The URL of the default image that's associated with the                       program.

ProgramApplnFormTemplate.name: ProgramApplnFormTemplate
ProgramApplnFormTemplate.description: Represents an application form template used to enroll in a program.

ApplicationFormTemplateId.description: The application form template associated with the record.

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the record.

EnrolleeRole.description: Specifies the role of the account enrolling for the program.

IndividualApplicationId.description: The Individual Application object associated with the program                       enrollment.

Name.description: The name of the ProgramProduct object.

ProductId.description: The Product2 object associated with the Program.

ProgramId.description: The Program parent object associated with the record.

RequiredDocuments.description: The documents required by the customer or contractor so that the                       application may be approved for this measure within this program.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the ProgramProduct object.

ResourceAbsence.name: ResourceAbsence
ResourceAbsence.description: Fields associated with a time period in which a service resource is          unavailable to work in Field Service.

ApprovalStatus.description: Specifies the approval status of the absense request made by the                       service resource.

ServicePoint.name: ServicePoint
ServicePoint.description: Represents an entry point for services to a premises. The service provided to          each service point is separately metered (or measured). Useful for energy services          including electricity, water and gas services.

ActivationDate.description: The date on which the service point was activated

AirPressureArea.description: The group of service points according to regions with similar air                       pressures where the service point is located.

AverageMonthlyUsage.description: The average monthly usage of the commodity being distributed                       through this service point

CalorificValueDistrict.description: The group of service points according to regions with similar                       calorific values where the service point is located.

DisconnectDate.description: The date on which the service point was disconnected from the                       grid

DisconnectReason.description: Specifies the reason a commodity service has been disconnected.

Distributor.description: The distributor supplying service to the premises.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The number that is used as an external identifier for the Service                       Point.

FieldServiceClass.description: Specifies the classification of the service point for field                       service.

GasPressureArea.description: The group of service points according to regions with similar gas                       pressures where the service point is located.

InstallationType.description: Specifies the type of meter installation at this service point.                       This field may be used by field service technicians when                       determining the correct crew to work on a job at this service                       point.

IsOkToEnter.description: Indicates whether a field service representative has the                       permission to enter the premises for reading the meter or other                       field service activities

IsPremisesInfoOverridden.description: Indicates whether the details on the premises are overridden by                       the corresponding details on the service point.

LoadProfile.description: Specifies the kind of load profile for the service point.

MeterReadInstructions.description: The Market Identifier value from an external system.

OwnerId.description: The name of the Service Point.

PremisesId.description: The Premise associated with the Service Point.

ReconnectDate.description: The date on which the service was reconnected

ReconnectReason.description: The reason that the service was reconnected.

ServiceType.description: Specifies the type of service being delivered at this service                       point.

Status.description: The status of the Service Point.

TemperatureArea.description: The group of service points according to regions with similar air                       temperatures where the service point is located.

UtilityProvider.description: The utility or energy provider supplying service to the premises.

VoltageLevel.description: The level of voltage supplied to a service point through the                       installed electric meter

WaterPressureArea.description: The group of service points according to regions with similar                       water pressures where the service point is located.

serviceresource.name: serviceresource
serviceresource.description: Represents a service technician or service crew in Field Service and          Salesforce Scheduler, or an agent in Workforce Engagement.

PayGradeId.description: The pay grade associated with the service resource.

ServiceResourceCostRule.name: ServiceResourceCostRule
ServiceResourceCostRule.description: Represents the rules that calculate the value of a meal or equivalent gifts          awarded to the field service worker.

ApexClassId.description: The Apex class associated with the service resource cost                       rule.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the service resource cost rule.

Description.description: The description of the service resource cost rule.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the service resource cost rule is active.

LaborUnionId.description: The labor union associated with the service resource cost                       rule.

Name.description: The name of the service resource cost rule.

Rule.description: The API name of the rule that calculates the supplemental                       compensation or the time sheet entry item.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the service resource cost rule.

StandardApexClass.description: The standard Apex class associated with the service resource cost rule.

ServiceResourceLeaveBalance.name: ServiceResourceLeaveBalance
ServiceResourceLeaveBalance.description: Stores the leave balances for service resources.

Name.description: The name of the service resource leave balance.

Service Resource.description: The service resource associated with the leave balance.

LeaveType.description: Specifies the type of the leave.

TotalLeaveCount.description: The total number of leave days allotted to the service resource.

AvailableLeaveCount.description: The remaining number of leave days available to the service resource.

SupplementalCompensation.name: SupplementalCompensation
SupplementalCompensation.description: Represents the meals or equivalent gifts awarded to the field service worker          according to the labor laws and company policies.

CompensationDate.description: The date when the service worker earned the supplemental                       compensation.

Cost.description: The cost of the supplemental compensation.

DeliveryType.description: The method used to deliver the supplemental compensation to the                       field service worker.

ExpirationDate.description: The date when the coupon, URL, or gift receipt expires.

GiftUrl.description: The link to the redeemable digital supplemental compensation.

Name.description: The name of the supplemental compensation earned by the field                       service worker.

ServiceResourceCostRuleId.description: The service resource cost rule that calculates the cost of the                       supplemental compensation.

ServiceResourceId.description: The service resource who receives the supplemental                       compensation.

TimesheetId.description: The timesheet associated with the shift in which the supplemental                       compensation was calculated or granted.

TimeSheet.name: TimeSheet
TimeSheet.description: Represents a schedule of a service resource’s time in Field Service or          Workforce Engagement.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of a job in the time sheet.

HasShiftEnded.description: Indicates whether the field service worker's shift has ended.

PayGradeId.description: The pay grade associated with the time sheet.

ServiceCrewMemberId.description: The service crew member associated with the time sheet.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of a job in the time sheet.

Status.description: The status of the time sheet.

StatusComment.description: The comment added with a status change to a time sheet.

VehicleDefinitionId.description: The type of vehicle used by the field service technician.

VehicleId.description: The service resource's vehicle associated with the time                       sheet.

TimeSheetEntry.name: TimeSheetEntry
TimeSheetEntry.description: Represents a span of time that a service resource spends on a field service          task.

Category.description: The time sheet entry category associated with a work order, work                       order line item, or a time sheet record.

CostCenterId.description: The cost center associated with the time sheet entry, if work                       order and work order line items are not available.

JobExpenseTypeId.description: The job expense type associated with the time sheet entry.

UnavailableReason.description: Specifies the reason that the service resource is                       unavailable.

VacationType.description: Specifies the type of vacation time.

VehicleDefinitionId.description: The type of vehicle used by the field service technician, if it is                       different from the one in the Time Sheet record.

VehicleId.description: The service resource's vehicle associated with the time sheet                       entry.

StatusComment.description: The comment added with a status change to a time sheet entry.

TimeBlockSequence.description: The order number of the time sheet entry relative to other time                       sheet entries, determining the sequence in which the entries are                       processed or displayed.

TimeSheetEntryItem.name: TimeSheetEntryItem
TimeSheetEntryItem.description: Represents the details of the time sheet entry that is used by an Enterprise          Asset Management system to pay the field service worker accroding to labor laws and company          policy.

CostCenterId.description: The cost center associated with the time sheet entry item.

DurationHours.description: The difference in hours between the end time and the start time of                       the time sheet entry item.

DurationMinutes.description: The difference in minutes beetween the end time and the start time                       of the time sheet entry item

EndTime.description: The time when the item from the time sheet entry ends.

JobExpenseTypeId.description: The job expense type associated with the time sheet entry                       item.

OvertimeApproverId.description: The overtime approver associated with the time sheet entry                       item.

OvertimeTypeId.description: The overtime type associated with the time sheet entry item.

PayTypeId.description: The pay type associated with the time sheet entry item, used to                       classify the time sheet entry.

ServiceResourceId.description: The service resource associated with the time sheet entry.

StartTime.description: The time when the item from the time sheet entry starts.

Status.description: Specifies the approval status of the time sheet entry item by the                       crew lead or supervisor.

StatusComment.description: The comment added with a status change to a time sheet entry                       item.

SubmitDate.description: The date when the crew lead or supervisor submits the time sheet                       entry item record.

TimeSheetEntryId.description: The time sheet associated with the time sheet entry item.

TimeSheetValidationError.name: TimeSheetValidationError
TimeSheetValidationError.description: Represents validation errors in time sheets, time sheet entries, and time          sheet entry items based on the rules defined by the admin.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the time sheet validation error.

Description.description: The description of the time sheet validation error.

IsResolved.description: Indicates whether the time sheet validation error is resolved                       (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The ID of the time sheet validation error.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The time sheet or time sheet entry record associated with the                       validation error.

ReferenceRecordObjectName.description: The name of the object that's associated with the validation                       error.

ServiceResourceCostRuleId.description: The service resource cost rule associated with the time sheet                       validation error.

TimeSheetWageTypeSummary.name: TimeSheetWageTypeSummary
TimeSheetWageTypeSummary.description: Represents a summary of the type of wages earned by a field service          resource.

DoubleTimeHours.description: The number of hours that a service resource works during a                       double-time shift as defined in labor agreements.

DoubleTimeMinutes.description: The number of minutes that a service resource works during a                       double-time shift, as defined in labor agreements.

EndTime.description: The time when the time sheet entry ends.

RegularTimeHours.description: The number of hours that a service resource works during a regular                       shift as defined in labor agreements.

RegularTimeMinutes.description: The number of minutes that a service resource works during a                       regular shift, as defined in labor agreements.

ServiceResourceId.description: The service resource associated with the time sheet.

StartTime.description: The time when the time sheet entry starts.

TimeAndHalfMinutes.description: The number of minutes that a service resource works during a                       time-and-a-half shift, as defined in labor agreements.

TimeSheetId.description: The time sheet associated with the time sheet wage type                       summary.

TimeandHalfHours.description: The number of hours that a service resource works during a                       time-and-a-half shift as defined in labor agreements.

UnpaidTimeHours.description: The number of unpaid hours when a service resource takes a break                       during working hours, as defined in labor agreements. This time                       isn't part of the service resource’s working hours.

UnpaidTimeMinutes.description: The number of unpaid minutes when a service resource takes a break                       during working hours, as defined in labor agreements. This time                       isn't part of the service resource’s working hours.

UsageImpactFactor.name: UsageImpactFactor
UsageImpactFactor.description: Represents a collection of fields to set up the Usage Impact Factors used          across jurisdictions and programs.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the Usage Impact Factor is active.

Name.description: The name of the Usage Impact Factor.

ShortForm.description: The acronym of the Usage Impact Factor.

Type.description: Specifies the type of Usage Impact Factor

UsageImpactGroup.name: UsageImpactGroup
UsageImpactGroup.description: Represents a collection of fields to set up the Usage Impact Groups          used across jurisdictions and programs.

Description.description: The description of the Usage Impact Group.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the Usage Impact Group is active.

Name.description: The name of the Usage Impact Group.

ShortForm.description: The acronym of the Usage Impact Group.

Type.description: Specifies the type of Usage Impact Group.

UsageImpactGroupFactor.name: UsageImpactGroupFactor
UsageImpactGroupFactor.description: Represents a junction between an Usage Impact Group version and Usage          Impact Factor.

FactorValue.description: Defines the value of the Usage Impact Group Factor.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the Usage Impact Group Factor is active.

Name.description: The name of the Usage Impact Group Factor.

UnitOfMeasureId.description: The UnitOfMeasure object associated with the Usage Impact Group                       Factor.

UsageImpactFactorId.description: The Usage Impact Factor object associated with the Usage Impact                       Group Factor.

UsageImpactGroupVersionId.description: The Usage Impact Group Version object associated with the Usage                       Impact Group Factor.

UsageImpactGroupPgmMeasure.name: UsageImpactGroupPgmMeasure
UsageImpactGroupPgmMeasure.description: Represents a junction between the program, product, and Usage Impact          Group version.

Description.description: The description of the Usage Impact Group Program Measure.

Name.description: The name of the Usage Impact Group Program Measure.

Product2Id.description: The Product2 object associated with the Usage Impact Group Program                       Measure.

ProgramId.description: The Program object associated with the Usage Impact Group Program                       Measure.

UsageImpactGroupVersionId.description: The Usage Impact Group Version associated with the Energy Saving                       Group Association.

UsageImpactGroupVersion.name: UsageImpactGroupVersion
UsageImpactGroupVersion.description: Represents a collection of fields to set up the versions of Usage Impact Groups.

ApprovedMeasureExtlid.description: The approved Measure Category ID assigned by a regulator.

Description.description: The description of the Usage Impact Group Version.

EndDate.description: The date when the validity of Usage Impact Group Version                       ends.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the Usage Impact Group Version is active.

Name.description: The name of the Usage Impact Group Version.

StartDate.description: The date when the validity of Usage Impact Group Version                       begins.

TechResourceManualCode.description: The code and version of the Technical Reference Manual which is                       the source for the values associated with this Usage Impact Group                       Version. This is necessary for regulatory reporting.

UsageImpactGroupId.description: The Usage Impact Group object associated with the Usage Impact                       Group Version.

Version.description: The version number of the Usage Impact Group Version.

WorkOrder.name: WorkOrder
WorkOrder.description: Represents field service work to be performed for a customer.

CostCenterId.description: The cost center associated with the work type.

JobExpenseTypeId.description: The job expense type associated with the work type.

WorkOrderLineItem.name: WorkOrderLineItem
WorkOrderLineItem.description: Represents a subtask on a work order in field service.

CostCenterId.description: The cost center associated with the work order line item.

JobExpenseTypeId.description: The job expense type associated with the work order line                       item.

WorkReport.name: WorkReport
WorkReport.description: Represents the total work performed by a contractor business in a certain          period of time for utility customers at one or more locations, providing services for one          or more measures.

ApplicationCount.description: The total number of applications submitted by the contractor in                       the work report. For example, the application submitted by a                       utility consumer for a clean energy program. The contractor adds                       this application to their work report.

ContractorAccountId.description: The account of the contractor assigned to the work who submitted                       the work report.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Possible values are:                            EUR—Euro                            USD—U.S.                             Dollar

EndDate.description: The date when the contractor completed the work.

ExternalInvoiceIdentifier.description: The identifier of the invoice generated by a utility company                       that's billed to the contractor.

MeasureCount.description: The total number of measures implemented by the contractor for the                       program.

Name.description: The name of the work report.

StartDate.description: The date when the contractor started the work.

ProcessingStatus.description: Possible values are:                           Failed                            ProcessedWithErrors—Processed With                             Errors                            ProcessingComplete—Processing Complete                            SubmissionInProgress—Submission In                             Progress                            UploadComplete—Upload Complete                            UploadInProgress—Upload In Progress                            UploadedWithErrors—Uploaded With Errors

WorkReportError.name: WorkReportError
WorkReportError.description: Represents errors in the Work Report through the Work Report Line Item          object.

Description.description: The instructions and information about the error that can be used                       to diagnose and fix the error.

IsOverridden.description: Indicates whether the work report error can be overridden for work                       report submission.

OverrideReason.description: The reason why the work report error was overridden.

WorkReportLineItem.name: WorkReportLineItem
WorkReportLineItem.description: Represents one measure of work performed by a contractor business for a          consumer at a location within a program.

AccountId.description: The utility's consumer or business account associated with the                       work report line item.

ContractorAccountId.description: The contractor associated with the work report line item

CustomerFirstName.description: The first name of the customer

CustomerLastName.description: The last name of the customer

Description.description: The description of the work report line item.

ExternalDocumentIdentifier.description: The externally generated ID associated with uploaded documents to                       this work report line item for application and invoice                       approvals.

HasError.description: Indicates whether the work report line item has submission                       errors.

LaborCost.description: The cost of labor for this work report line item.

LocationId.description: The location associated with the work report line item. The                       premises of the customer account in which the measure was                       installed.

LocationStreetAddress.description: The reference street address for the customer's premises.

MaterialCost.description: The cost of materials and parts for this work report line                       item.

Measure.description: The equipment or part that is installed, repaired, or maintained                       for this work report line item

Name.description: The name of the work report line item.

OtherCost.description: The cost of taxes, fees, and other charges that are not attributed                       to materials or labor for this work report line item.

ProcessingStatus.description: Specifies the processing status of the work report line item.

ProductQuantity.description: The quantity of the measure installed at the premises for the same                       program.

ProgramProductId.description: The program product associated with the work report line item.                       These are individual measures within a program implemented at the                       location by the contractor.

ServiceDate.description: The date when the measure was implemented at the customer's                       premises.

TotalCost.description: The sum of the material cost, labor cost and the other costs in                       this record. The total invoice for the service provided to the                       property for the measure within the program for the account on this                       line item.

WorkReportId.description: The work report ID associated with the work report line item                       generated after submission in run time.

worktype.name: worktype
worktype.description: Represents a type of work to be performed in Field Service and Lightning          Scheduler. Work types are templates that can be applied to work order or work order line          items.

CostCenterId.description: The cost center associated with the work type.

JobExpenseTypeId.description: The job expense type associated with the work type..
